description: Synthesize information from ecological literature on a selected research topic, formatted as a journal review paper with a conceptual figure. Requires 10+ peer-reviewed sources and 1700-word limit.

Design/conduct ecological field research during a 4-day field trip, then individually analyze data and write a journal-style paper (2850 words). Requires original data collection and 10+ peer-reviewed sources.
1-hour handwritten test with 6 short-answer questions assessing understanding of key ecological concepts from course discussions.
Weekly handwritten quizzes at start of classes testing comprehension of pre-class readings. 6 quizzes total, lowest score dropped.
